content: Set storage quota to define the maximum disk space for this {{productName}}.

comment.text: "Defines the maximum disk space allowed for {{productName}}. This quota will be displayed as a storage limit option in the [Change Storage Quota Dialog] when setting or editing storage limits."

usage.context:
<Text noSelect>
 {isDisableQuota
 ? t("Common:TurnOffDiskSpaceLimit", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })
 : t("Common:SetDiskSpaceQuota", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 </Text>
 {!isDisableQuota ? (
 <QuotaForm

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "yaddaş kvotasını" is a literal translation of 'storage quota' but might not be the most natural or clear phrasing in Azerbaijani. 'Disk kvotasını' would be more common and understandable in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu {{productName}} üçün maksimum disk yerini müəyyən etmək üçün disk kvotasını təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "define" is inaccurate. 'Určete' implies determination or specification, but 'define' in this context means to establish or set.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiště a určete maximální velikost disku pro tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “prostor” is not the correct translation of “productName”. It means “space”.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiště a určete maximální velikost disku pro tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ορίστε ποσόστωση αποθ. χώρου" is not the most natural way to express 'Set storage quota'. A more accurate and idiomatic translation would be something like "Καθορίστε όριο αποθηκευτικού χώρου".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Καθορίστε όριο αποθηκευτικού χώρου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'αποθ.' is not standard and is potentially confusing. It's best to use the full word 'αποθηκευτικού'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: αποθηκευτικού

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure "για να ορίσετε τον μέγιστο χώρο στον δίσκο για αυτό το {{productName}}" is a bit clunky. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: για να καθορίσετε τον μέγιστο χώρο δίσκου για το {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and repetitive. 'Définissez le quota de stockage pour définir l'espace de stockage maximum...' repeats the concept of setting a storage quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Définissez le quota de stockage maximal pour ce {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and clunky. "Սահմանեք պահեստի չափը՝ այս {{productName}}-ի համար սկավառակի առավելագույն տարածությունը սահմանելու համար:" translates to 'Set the storage size to define the maximum disk space for this {{productName}} to define the maximum disk space'.  The repetition of 'սահմանելու համար' (to define) is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and natural phrasing, such as: "Սահմանեք պահեստի չափը՝ {{productName}}-ի համար առավելագույն սկավառակի տարածությունը սահմանելու համար:" or "Սահմանեք պահեստի չափը՝ որպեսզի {{productName}}-ի համար սահմանվի առավելագույն սկավառակի տարածությունը:"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the variable '{{productName}}' feels slightly awkward due to the lengthy phrasing around it. While not technically incorrect, it could be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate whether moving '{{productName}}' closer to the beginning of the sentence would improve flow. For example, "{{productName}}-ի համար սահմանեք պահեստի չափը..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ストレージ容量制限を設定してください" (set storage capacity limit) is a bit too literal and sounds unnatural in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would focus on setting the quota itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}のディスク使用量の上限を設定してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order could be improved for better flow. Placing the product name closer to 'disk space' makes it more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}で使用可能なディスク容量の上限を設定してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "스토리지 할당량을 설정하세요" (Set storage quota) is slightly awkward. A more natural Korean phrasing for 'Set storage quota' would be '저장 공간 할당량을 설정하세요' or '디스크 공간 할당량을 설정하세요'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 저장 공간 할당량을 설정하세요

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses "ກຸ້ມຂັ້ນເງິນ" which translates to 'money limit' or 'financial limit'. This is not an accurate translation of 'storage quota'. A better translation would focus on the concept of disk space allocation or limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຳນົດຂະໜານະຍາສູມສູງສຸດຂອງເນື້ອທີ່ໃນໂຕ້ຖາດ ຫຼື ກຳນົດຈຳນວນສູງສຸດຂອງເນື້ອທີ່ໃນໂຕ້ຖາດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ໃນໂຕ້ຖາດສຳລັບ {{productName}} ນີ້" is slightly awkward. It could be more naturally expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃນໂຕ້ຖາດຂອງ {{productName}} ນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Iestatiet krātuves kvotu, lai definētu maksimālo vietu šajā {{productName}} diskā" is not a direct or optimal translation of "Set storage quota to define the maximum disk space for this {{productName}}." The addition of 'diskā' (in the disk) is unnecessary and slightly awkward in Latvian. It's implied by 'krātuves kvotu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet krātuves kvotu, lai definētu maksimālo vietu {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'spațiu' (space) doesn't accurately reflect the English 'productName'. It should refer to the product itself, not the space it occupies.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Setați cota de stocare pentru a defini spațiul maxim de stocare pentru acest {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Setați' (Set) is a command form, which might sound abrupt depending on the overall tone of the UI. A more polite phrasing might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stabiliți cota de stocare pentru a defini spațiul maxim de stocare pentru acest {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ආචයන සලාකය" is not an accurate translation of 'storage quota'. It seems to be a combination of terms that doesn't convey the intended meaning. 'ආචයන' is associated with ritual or ceremony, and 'සලාකය' is a mixture or blend. This is confusing and doesn't accurately represent the concept of a storage quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation for 'storage quota' would be something like 'ගබඩා ඉඩකට්ටිය' (gabada idakattiyam) or 'භද්‍රවාර ඉඩ' (bhadrāvara ida). Consider using a term that is commonly understood within the relevant technical context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "මෙම {{productName}} සඳහා තැටියේ උපරිම ඉඩ පෙන්වීමට" is grammatically awkward. It implies showing the maximum space rather than setting it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to something like "මෙම {{productName}} සඳහා උපරිම ගබඩා ඉඩ සකසන්න" (darakara uparimak gabada ida sakasanna) - 'Set the maximum storage space for this {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'define' is awkward. 'Vymedzili' can imply a boundary or limit, but doesn't fully capture the meaning of setting a quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiska, aby ste určili maximálnu veľkosť disku pre tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'priestor' is used instead of 'disk' or 'úložisko'. While 'priestor' can mean space, in this context 'disk' or 'úložisko' is more precise and natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte kvótu úložiska, aby ste určili maximálnu veľkosť disku pre tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'складишну' (skladishnu) is not the most natural or accurate translation for 'storage' in this context. 'Члану' (članu) or 'простора' (prostora) would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите члану квоту да бисте дефинисали максимални простор на диску за овај {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically not incorrect, 'диску' can also be 'диск'. Using 'диск' might sound slightly more formal and consistent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите члану квоту да бисте дефинисали максимални простор на диску за овај {{productName}}.
